segment.text: I'd recommend talking to the mayor of the village when you get a chance.
I don't think that the @ is anywhere around here, but the General and I both think # lies within the lava or ice caverns.
It's a shame that the entrance to those caverns is inaccessible.
I can't wait for the King's thanks when I finally find his %.
Let me know before the General if you make any progress or find anything. I'll be around.
